A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I think this movie lacks any real substance\, the characters were poorly used. The development of newer characters were flat and lacking and real connections to who they are. The progress of the movie would slow and feel unnecessary. The Plot holes are endless. Im very upset on how Rian Johnson utilities not only Luke but his relationship with Rey. I could go on\, but Im more curious as to how JJ Abrams will continue from here.
